summary: This is an email from the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York regarding a redlined statement concerning Jeffrey Epstein, sent on August 10, 2019, with an attached document titled 'Jeffrey_Epstein_Statement.docx'.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: The email and its attachment concern a statement about Jeffrey Epstein, indicating he is the central subject of the correspondence from the U.S. Attorney's Office.

events.title: Email regarding Epstein statement
events.description: An email was sent from the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York concerning a redlined statement about Jeffrey Epstein.

keyFacts: The document is an email dated August 10, 2019, concerning a redlined statement about Jeffrey Epstein.
The email originates from the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York.
An attachment titled 'Jeffrey_Epstein_Statement.docx' was included with the email.
